_header: On this ne trust I me nought…
_description: A couplet in Nicholas Bozon’s Contes moralisés

GraysInn12.First Lines:
On þis ne trist I me nout…þis haue I now y
                    kouth
GraysInn12.Note:
Written as prose, lines 21-23, with French prose
                    intervening.
GraysInn12.Editions:
Smith,  Lucy Toulmin,
                        ed.  
             Les contes moralisés de Nicole Bozon.
Societe des anciens textes francais
         50. Paris: Firmin Didot, 1889: 110.
Wilson,  Richard Middlewood. 
             “More Lost Literature II.” 
             Leeds Studies in English
         6 (1937): 30-49: 45.
Ross,  Alan S. C. 
             “English in Nicole Bozon’s Contes Moralisés.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         50 (1949): 200-20: 208.
